languages.text: "Придется открутить пару вентилей там, еще парочку — здесь... И запустить воздуховодную систему через старенький когитатор, да хранит его машинный дух Великий!"

traits.locale_text: "Придется открутить пару вентилей тем, еще парочку — здесь... И запустить воздуховодную систему через старенький когитатор, да хранит его машинный дух Великий!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
languages.original_text: "Придется открутить пару вентилей там, еще парочку — здесь... И запустить воздуховодную систему через старенький когитатор, да хранит его машинный дух Великий!"

traits.locale_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あっちのバルブをいくつか回して、こっちで別のバルブを回さなくちゃいけないわ。それから、古い考算機を使って歓喜システムを起動しなくちゃ。エグザルテッド・ワンがその機械精霊を維持してくださいますように！」
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: 「あっちのバルブをいくつか回して、こっちで別のバルブを回さなくちゃいけないわ。それから、古い考算機を使って歓喜システムを起動しなくちゃ。エグザルテッド・ワンがその機械精霊を維持してくださいますように！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我们需要到处溜达一圈，转动几个阀门……之后启动老旧的沉思者，打开通风系统。至高无上的神皇保佑，愿它的机魂依然完好无损！”
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: “我们需要到处溜达一圈，转动几个阀门……之后启动老旧的思考器，打开通风系统。至高无上的神皇保佑，愿它的机魂依然完好无损！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora, a girar un par de válvulas por aquí, otro par por allá... y a activar el sistema de ventilación con un cogitador viejo. ¡Que el Exaltado guarde su espíritu máquina!».
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: «Ahora, a girar un par de válvulas por aquí, otro par por allá... y a activar el sistema de ventilación con un cogitador viejo. ¡Que el Exaltado guarde su espíritu máquina!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il faudra tourner quelques valves ici, et celles-ci aussi... Puis lancer le système de ventilation à l'aide de ce vieux cogitateur. Que l'Exalté protège son esprit de la machine ! »
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: « Il faudra tourner quelques valves ici, et celles-ci aussi... Puis lancer le système de ventilation à l'aide de ce vieux cogitateur. Que l'Exalté protège son esprit de la machine ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wir müssen hier und da an einigen Ventilen drehen ... und das Ventilationssystem mit einem alten Cogitator starten. Möge der Erhabene seinen Maschinengeist bewahren!"
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen hier und da an einigen Ventilen drehen ... und das Ventilationssystem mit einem alten Cogitator starten. Möge der Erhabene seinen Maschinengeist bewahren!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şurada burada bir iki vana çevirmemiz icap edecek. Bir de havalandırma sistemini çalıştırmak için eski bir kavramsayara bakacağız. Görkemli onun makine ruhuna rahmet etsin!"
languages.original_text: "We'll need to turn a few valves there, and another couple here... And start up the ventilation system using an old cogitator, may the Exalted One preserve its machine spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Şurada burada bir iki vana çevirmemiz icap edecek. Eski kavramsayar yardımıyla havalandırma da sistemini çalıştıracağız. Görkemli onun makine ruhuna rahmet etsin!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
